name: Preloader for Website
author: WP OnlineSupport, Essential Plugin

sections.description:
Preloader gives your site an animated loading screen.

Check Features and Demo for additional information.

It’s a great and lightweight way to add spice to any site. Simply activate the plugin and enable the Loader from “Preloader – WPOS” menu tab.

It works everywhere. It’s been tested on desktop browsers along with a variety of iOS, Android and Windows devices.

Available Features :

  • 2 Preloader
  • Preloader Type
  • Custom Content
  • Content Font Color
  • Content Font Size
  • Preloader Background Color
  • Light weight

PRO Features Include

Additional Enable Preloader Options
Preloader Type
Preloader Visibility
17 Predefined Spinner
3 Preloader sizes
Add your own loader image
Preloader Minimum Runtime
Preloader Disappear Time
Custom Content
Hide On Locations
Preloader area background image
Templating

View PRO DEMO and Features for more details) for additional information.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘preloader-for-website’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the “preloader-for-website” list plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Preloader – WPOS then select enable preloader and select your spinner.
  4. Now you can see preloader on your website.
sections.changelog:
1.3 (21, Nov 2023)

  • [*] Update – Added nonce security to plugin reset setting.
  • [*] Tested up to: 6.4.1

1.2.2 (14, Feb 2022)

  • [*] Tested up to: 5.9
  • [-] Removed some unwanted code and files.

1.2.1 (20, Aug 2021)

  • [*] Updated all external links
  • [*] Tweak – Code optimization and performance improvements.
  • [*] Updated language file.

1.2 (26, March 2021)

  • [+] New – Added Preloader Type (Default, Only Content).
  • [+] New – Added Custom Content option.
  • [+] New – Added Content Font Size option.
  • [+] New – Added Content Font Color option.
  • [*] Tweak – Code optimization and performance improvements.
  • [*] Fix – jQuery not defined issue fixed for Twenty Twenty theme.
  • [*] Check compatibility with WordPress version 5.7 and jQuery 3.5.1

1.0.1 (14, July 2020)

  • [+] Added language template file.
  • [*] Fix some typo mistake.

1.0

  • Initial release.

Just install and finished. Works perfectly for me.
